entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
